comments.html: Probably, it would be beneficial mentioning the RIPE Database. The recent RDAP protocol, the RPL for expressing routing policies. I remember back in the 90s using RIPE routing information for generating proper BGP configurations. Every ISP could use those... The solution is well known, just lot of people ignore it, since it requires some resources and has some costs. It is easier to sell a really best effort service. The final decision is at the customer hand. Are you happy with a best effort, not reliable service or do you pay for better quality? A single Internet cannot fulfill all the diverse requirements...
comments.name: Bela Varkonyi
